file_content.text: Excuse me, my lord. Agent Velloo, First Duros Division, Imperial Intelligence.
Excuse me, sir. Agent Velloo, First Duros Division, Imperial Intelligence.
Hunter, a word? Agent Velloo, First Duros Division, Imperial Intelligence.
Such an august group all traveling together. Amazing. Agent Velloo, First Duros Division, Imperial Intelligence.
May I say, sir, you are an inspiration to all of us. Without your success, the Empire would have never allowed a fully alien division.
Admiral Jefand Ange has been recalled to Nar Shaddaa and requests your help. He remembers your success among my people and the less savory types on the Smuggler's Moon.
I beg you to reconsider. You did wonders in your short time on Nar Shaddaa.
I'm afraid it's as bad as it sounds.
Indeed. For a series of lucrative jobs.
The loathsome Hutt Cartel maintains its neutrality and restricts our options on Nar Shaddaa, but the Republic is making major moves there.
Colonel Harok will meet you in the spaceport on Nar Shaddaa and give you the full briefing. Be circumspect but hurry, or we could lose the moon for good.
Things are becoming tense on Nar Shaddaa.
You're an inspiration to us all.
